stories.story: As a User, I want to upload and resize images so that they fit the layout requirements.

detected_violations.issue:
The [Means] contain more than 1 tasks:
(1) upload images
(2) resize images
detected_violations.suggestion: Select one task in [Means] that suitable to the user story, or separate it to the different user story.
